author: ashithanagesh
title: McDonald’s tweets Donald Trump telling him he has tiny hands
text:
Savage (Picture: AP/Twitter) McDonald’s sent Donald Trump a tweet telling him he’s ‘disgusting’ and has tiny hands.
At around 1.15pm GMT, the official McDonald’s company handle – @McDonaldsCorp – sent a tweet to the President telling him exactly what they thought of him.
It said: ‘@realDonaldTrump you are actually a disgusting excuse of a President and we would love to have @BarackObama back, also you have tiny hands.’
Then, just to really stick the knife in, they pinned it to the top of their page.
They've pinned it. It's McWar. pic.twitter.com/ToHgvObE00 
— Mollie Goodfellow (@hansmollman) March 16, 2017 

Unsurprisingly it got thousands of likes and retweets – before it was very quickly deleted.
Tourists and BBC crew injured with lava and rocks in huge Mount Etna explosion Fortunately, however, almost everyone on Twitter managed to get a screenshot beforehand.
Given the lightning speed with which it was deleted, we’re guessing that the account was either hacked, or a social media manager went rogue on their last day with the company.
We’ve yet to get a response from Trump, but he’ll probably be a bit disappointed – McDonald’s is (or, rather, was) apparently his favourite food .
In fact, he was even in one of their adverts back in the day .
Metro.co.uk has contacted McDonald’s for comment.
